column1: Master of Science in Electronic Engineering
column2: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
column3: School of Engineering - Taught Postgraduate Programs
column5: At a fundamental level, the increasing speed at which we can acquire, interpret, and take action based on information impacts on many of the changes we are observing in the modern world. Much of this increased speed is due to advances in Electronic Engineering.
column7: 2024/25 Fall intake - Full-time students: HK$192,500 (~US$24,700) - paid in 2 installments - Part-time students: HK$168,300 (~US$21,600) - paid in 4 installments  For other fees, please visit the university website.
